value:
$WmMPID_ラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Normal,Face|How will the poets sing of our great
victory here today, I wonder... I hope
they manage to capture my glory!$k$p$WmMPID_ターナ,ch08_05_Turner_F_Normal,Face|Innes once fought a battle like this.
If we win, he has to recognize our
strength. Don't you agree, Eirika?$k$p$WmMPID_エイリーク,ch08_01_Eirik_F_Normal,Face|Indeed. And Ephraim and Lyon
as well... Let's put forth our best
effort and leave nothing to regret!$k$p
